name: Lost in Space (itch) (Good Vybe)
description:
Lost in Space is a short game featuring a lone spaceman who's lost in, well, space. Using only his trusty fire extinguisher, help him get back to his ship!

 There's one catch to your mission, however.

 Every squirt of Extinguisher Juice will make him spiral out of control! Use your wit and the power of zero gravity physics to get him back to his ship!

In Version 1.4, in addition to the Normal Difficulty, we've introduced a Hard Mode that has a longer travel distance, the Extinguisher Juice depletes faster, and there are more obstacles to run into.

This game was made for #GMTKJam2020, and probably won't be updated further, but please stayed tuned for our next project.


Controls:
Space/Left Mouse: Release Extinguisher Juice
Mouse: Aim Nozzle
ESC: Pause

It's that simple.

Staff Credits:

Programming: Andrew Jacobson
3D Art Assets: Will Roberts
Music and SFX: James Rogers
Project Management: Lucas Goodwin
Social Media and Pages: Brett Wilson
